value:
select 'axis' as sys_cd,'axis' as sys_name,'axis' as sys_desc,'Y' as ltst_rec_ind,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind, current_timestamp as rec_crt_dtm,current_timestamp as rec_updt_dtm
from dual
UNION
select 'penta' as sys_cd,'penta' as sys_name,'penta' as sys_desc,'Y' as ltst_rec_ind,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind, current_timestamp as rec_crt_dtm,current_timestamp as rec_updt_dtm
from dual
UNION
select 'market' as sys_cd,'market' as sys_name,'market' as sys_desc,'Y' as ltst_rec_ind,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind, current_timestamp as rec_crt_dtm,current_timestamp as rec_updt_dtm
from dual
UNION
select 'global' as sys_cd,'global' as sys_name,'global' as sys_desc,'Y' as ltst_rec_ind,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind, current_timestamp as rec_crt_dtm,current_timestamp as rec_updt_dtm
from dual

SELECT 
sys_cd,
sys_name,
sys_desc,
ltst_rec_ind,
actv_rec_ind,
etl_audit_id,
rec_crt_dtm,
rec_updt_dtm
FROM
cdp_rdm.TSYSTEM
